action.action-desc: Mr. Stauber (for himself and Mr. Mfume) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act to modify the requirements relating to the evaluation of the subcontracting plans of certain offerors, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Strengthening Subcontracting for Small Businesses Act of 2022.
Section 8(d)(4)(G) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 637(d)(4)(G)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking bundled contract and all that follows through for subcontracting and inserting contract that includes a subcontracting plan required under this paragraph; and

in clause (i), by striking the rate provided under the subcontracting plan for small business participation and inserting the description in the subcontracting plan of the extent to which the offeror proposes to use small business concerns as subcontractors (at any tier).
